price: ߞߋߟߊ߫ ߟߴߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߝߊ߬ ߛߊߣߌ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߘߐߛߊߙߌ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
